report.title: OSIRIS species tabular
report.description: Lists all species in a sample with OSIRIS traits summarised.
report.query: select #columns# from cache_occurrences o join cache_taxa_taxon_lists ttl on ttl.id=o.preferred_taxa_taxon_list_id left join taxa_taxon_list_attribute_values av_ed on av_ed.taxa_taxon_list_id=ttl.id and av_ed.deleted=false and av_ed.taxa_taxon_list_attribute_id=#ed_attr_id# left join cache_termlists_terms t_ed on t_ed.id=av_ed.int_value left join taxa_taxon_list_attribute_values av_h on av_h.taxa_taxon_list_id=ttl.id and av_h.deleted=false and av_h.taxa_taxon_list_attribute_id=#h_attr_id# left join cache_termlists_terms t_h on t_h.id=av_h.int_value left join taxa_taxon_list_attribute_values av_r on av_r.taxa_taxon_list_id=ttl.id and av_r.deleted=false and av_r.taxa_taxon_list_attribute_id=#r_attr_id# left join cache_termlists_terms t_r on t_r.id=av_r.int_value where o.sample_id=#sample_id# #filters#
